EmailTemplate.name: IPM_BET_ET_Archived
EmailTemplate.subject: IPM Project's Linked BET archived.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The BET {!IPM_Project__c.BET_Archived_BET_Text__c} that your IPM project {!IPM_Project__c.Name} is linked to has been archived in the BET system. Please contact the BET Owner if this is in error.
